name: part_011
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】Ray of Jewelry【#ホロ0期生ライブ2024】 [AUu9pSkkgaY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: Intro cinematics showing close-ups of the performers and their outfits.
Live performance of the song 'ray' by Hololive 0th Generation.

subtitles.original:
ray
作詞・作曲：藤原基央
subtitles.english:
ray
Lyrics & Music: Motoo Fujiwara

subtitles.original: お別れしたのはもっと前の事だったような
subtitles.english: It feels like it's been even longer since we said goodbye

subtitles.original: 哀しい光は封じ込めて 踵すり減らしたんだ
subtitles.english: I sealed away that sad light and wore down my heels

subtitles.original: 君といた時は見えた 今は見えなくなった
subtitles.english: I could see it when I was with you, but now it's gone from my sight

subtitles.original: 透明な彗星をぼんやりと
subtitles.english: I was vacantly watching a transparent comet

subtitles.original: でもそれだけ探している
subtitles.english: But that's the only thing I'm looking for

subtitles.original: しょっちゅう唄を歌ったよ
subtitles.english: I sang songs all the time

subtitles.original: その時だけのメロディーを
subtitles.english: Using the melody that existed only then

subtitles.original: 寂しくなんかなかったよ
subtitles.english: I wasn't lonely at all

subtitles.original: ちゃんと寂しくなれたから
subtitles.english: Because I was able to properly feel lonely

subtitles.original: いつまでどこまでなんて
subtitles.english: How long, how far

subtitles.original: 正常か異常かなんて
subtitles.english: Is it normal or abnormal?

subtitles.original: 考える暇も無い程
subtitles.english: So much that I don't even have time to think about it

subtitles.original: 歩くのは大変だ
subtitles.english: It's hard to keep walking

subtitles.original: 楽しい方がずっといいよ
subtitles.english: It's much better to have fun

subtitles.original: ごまかして笑っていくよ
subtitles.english: I'll keep laughing and faking it

subtitles.original: 大丈夫だ あの痛みは
subtitles.english: It's okay, that pain...

subtitles.original: 忘れたって消えやしない
subtitles.english: won't disappear even if I forget it

subtitles.original: 理想で作った道を
subtitles.english: The path I made with ideals

subtitles.original: 現実が塗り替えてゆくよ
subtitles.english: Reality is painting over it

subtitles.original: 思い出はその軌跡の上で
subtitles.english: Memories are on those tracks

subtitles.original: 輝きになって残っている
subtitles.english: Remaining as a sparkle

subtitles.original: お別れしたのは何で
subtitles.english: Why did we say goodbye?

subtitles.original: 何のためだったんだろうな
subtitles.english: I wonder what it was all for

subtitles.original: 哀しい光が僕の影を
subtitles.english: The sad light casts my shadow...

subtitles.original: 前に長く伸ばしている
subtitles.english: long and ahead of me

subtitles.original: 時々熱が出るよ
subtitles.english: Sometimes I get a fever

subtitles.original: 時間がある時眠るよ
subtitles.english: I sleep when I have time

subtitles.original: 夢だと解るその中で
subtitles.english: Inside a dream I know is a dream

subtitles.original: 君と会ってからまた行こう
subtitles.english: After I meet you, I'll go again

subtitles.original: 晴天とはほど遠い
subtitles.english: It's far from a clear sky

subtitles.original: 終わらない暗闇にも
subtitles.english: Even in the endless darkness

subtitles.original: 星を思い浮かべたなら
subtitles.english: If I imagine the stars

subtitles.original: すぐ銀河の中だ
subtitles.english: I'm immediately inside the galaxy

subtitles.original: あまり泣かなくなっても
subtitles.english: Even if I don't cry as much

subtitles.original: 靴を新しくしても
subtitles.english: Even if I get new shoes

subtitles.original: 大丈夫だ あの痛みは
subtitles.english: It's okay, that pain...

subtitles.original: 忘れたって消えやしない
subtitles.english: won't disappear even if I forget it

subtitles.original: 伝えたかった事が
subtitles.english: The things I wanted to tell you...

subtitles.original: きっとあったんだろうな
subtitles.english: I'm sure there were some

subtitles.original: 恐らくありきたりなんだろうけど
subtitles.english: They're probably commonplace

subtitles.original: こんなにも
subtitles.english: But even so...

subtitles.original: お別れした事は
subtitles.english: That we said goodbye

subtitles.original: 出会った事と繋がっている
subtitles.english: Is connected to the fact that we met

subtitles.original: あの透明な彗星は
subtitles.english: That transparent comet...

subtitles.original: 透明だから無くならない
subtitles.english: is transparent, so it never disappears

subtitles.original: 〇✕△どれかなんて
subtitles.english: Circles, crosses, triangles, which one?

subtitles.original: 皆と比べてどうかだなんて
subtitles.english: How does it compare to everyone else?

subtitles.original: 確かめる間も無い程
subtitles.english: So much that there's no time to check

subtitles.original: 生きるのは最高だ
subtitles.english: Being alive is the best

subtitles.original: あまり泣かなくなっても
subtitles.english: Even if I don't cry as much

subtitles.original: ごまかして笑っていくよ
subtitles.english: I'll keep laughing and faking it

subtitles.original: 大丈夫だ あの痛みは
subtitles.english: It's okay, that pain...

subtitles.original: 忘れたって消えやしない
subtitles.english: won't disappear even if I forget it

subtitles.original: 大丈夫だ この光の
subtitles.english: It's okay, at the beginning...

subtitles.original: 始まりには
subtitles.english: of this light...

subtitles.original: 君がいる
subtitles.english: you are there
